story: You venture into the bustling crypto bazaar üè™, where holographic NFTs sparkle like rare loot, and shady traders whisper '10x gains guaranteed' in a dozen languages. You're pitched an 'Exclusive NFT,' and before you know it, you've accidentally bought an NFT of a shoe‚Ä¶ but only the left one üëü. Incredibly, sneaker collectors are drooling over it! üòÆ

options.text: Sell the Left Shoe NFT to a sneakerhead
Find the matching Right Shoe NFT to complete the set
Keep the Left Shoe NFT and call it 'art'
Shill the Left Shoe NFT on Cryptowitter

blockchainCommand: Create a new NFT called 'Left Shoe NFT' with description 'A collectible digital left shoe that inexplicably attracts sneakerheads.' Mint and send it to 0x1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef12345678
dallEPrompt: A futuristic crypto bazaar full of quirky traders and glowing holographic NFT shoes, with a character holding a shiny 'Left Shoe NFT' while others offer desperate trades.
blockchainResponse:
undefinedI can create the NFT for you, but I need a valid contract address to deploy the NFT (ERC-721) from. 

If you don't have a contract address yet, I can help you deploy a new NFT contract first. Would you like me to do that?
